You\'ll usually see the money in your bank account within minutes when you use your eligible debit card. There\'s a $0.25 fee. Or, you can use the free, standard option. Withdrawals may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank.

Confirming customers\' identities is one of the best ways we help keep your account secure. You\'ll generally only have to do this once.
Thanks. You\'re all set

We\'ll email you as soon as we\'ve finished reviewing your documents. This usually takes 2-3 working days.

This is an 8-digit number usually found on the front of your bank card, or on your bank statement.

By tapping Add Bank Account, you consent to an identity and credit check.
We need your International Bank Account Number (IBAN) to identify and process payments. You can usually find your IBAN on your bank statement, via online banking or by contacting your bank.
Direct Debit Agreement

Thanks for providing your %1$s details. You can now withdraw money from PayPal to your bank account.\n\nPlease accept the Direct Debit Agreement below if you\'d also like us to automatically fund payments from your bank account when you make purchases with PayPal.
Direct Debit Agreement
INSTRUCTION REFERENCE NUMBER

By tapping Accept you agree to the SEPA Direct Debit Agreement and authorise PayPal to send instructions to your bank account. You also authorise your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from PayPal. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks, starting from the date on which your account was debited.
Finish Later
Submit Instruction
To buy online or send money, you must first accept the Direct Debit Agreement
Confirm your bank account
Check your bank in a few days for the confirmation code we\'ve sent, then come back and enter it.

We\'ve sent a confirmation code to your bank account. Log in to your online banking or call your bank to get the code. To make sure you receive it, we\'ll send the code each time you make a transaction until you confirm your bank account.
Direct Debit Agreement
Accept direct debit authorisation now
Please check your entries and try again.
Unauthorised

Payments will appear as PAYPAL on your bank statement. A copy of your Direct Debit Instruction will be emailed to you.

If your bank account requires more than one person\'s signature to authorise a Direct Debit Instruction, please select Finish Later and go to paypal.co.uk to print the instructions and post us a signed copy.
Sort code

Your sort code is a 6-digit number located on your bank statement.

We\'re sorry, we\'re not able to remove %1$s at the moment. Please try again later.
Every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it straight to your bank account.

Turn it off

Your debit card has expired. Please choose another bank account or debit card.
For your security, we\'ve turned off automatic transfers. Choose another debit card or bank account to turn it back on.
Now, whenever you receive money, we\'ll withdraw all of it to your %1$s. You can always turn this off in your Settings.
There\'s an issue with your bank account or debit card
Please choose a different bank account or card to turn automatic transfers on.
We\'ve had to turn off automatic transfers for the moment. You can still transfer money to your bank account.
Make your transfers automatic. No need to log in. Go to your Settings to turn this on.
We\'re sorry, something seems to have gone wrong
We\'re sorry, we\'re not able to set up automatic transfers for you at the moment. You can try again the next time you transfer money to your bank account. Or try turning them on in your Settings.
